back_cards.definition_en: A flat piece used in construction
back_cards.example_en: The carpenter fitted a wooden panel to the door.
The panel discussed environmental policies.
The pilot monitored the aircraft’s panel.
The museum showcased an ancient carved panel.
The panel selected the winner of the contest.
The firefighter was hailed as a hero.
The hero of the novel saved the village.
Her teacher was her hero growing up.
Hercules is a famous Greek hero.
The athlete became a national hero.
She drew a circle on the board.
Their reading circle met weekly.
The children sat in a circle for the game.
The seasons follow a circle each year.
The park lies within the city circle.

back_cards.definition_en: A reviewer of art or media
back_cards.example_en: The film critic wrote a glowing review.
Her boss was a tough critic of her work.
The music critic praised the singer.
He was a critic of the new law.
The critic explored the poem’s themes.
She solved the puzzle in ten minutes.
They met to solve their conflict.
He solved the issue with the printer.
The detective solved the crime quickly.
They worked to solve the funding issue.
She was too busy to meet for lunch.
The streets were busy during the festival.
He kept busy painting the house.
The artwork was busy with vibrant patterns.
The phone was busy when I called.
The new episode aired last night.
The argument was a brief episode.
The episode covered space exploration.
He recovered from an episode of flu.
The book’s final episode was thrilling.
She went back to her office after lunch.
He stepped back from the edge.
The store was back to normal after the sale.
I’ll text you back after the meeting.
Her team backed her idea fully.
He checked the answers before submitting.
She checked the list after shopping.
They checked her passport at the gate.
The mechanic checked the engine.
He checked his temper during the debate.
A degree is a requirement for the job.
The course has strict requirements.
The software met all requirements.
Passing the test is a requirement.
Safety requirements must be followed.
The politician spoke about tax reform.
She ran as a politician for mayor.
The politician pushed for education funding.
He was a skilled politician in debates.
The politician listened to community concerns.
The rain fell heavily all morning.
We stayed inside colpague
The rain ruined our outdoor plans.
The rain flooded the streets.
A rain of petals fell at the festival.
The rain delayed the construction work.
My colleague helped with the presentation.
She met colleagues at the conference.
Her colleagues supported the new initiative.
He and his colleague designed the website.
Her colleague shared the office space.
The moon disappeared behind the clouds.
Her keys disappeared from her bag.
The pain disappeared after rest.
He disappeared after the party.
Some traditions disappear over time.
He enjoyed a cold beer after work.
They served beer at the barbecue.
This beer is made with local ingredients.
Beer pairs well with spicy food.
Beer was central to the festival.
The app predicted rain this evening.
She predicted the team’s victory.
Scientists predict rising temperatures.
Analysts predict market growth.
He predicted she’d arrive late.
Daily exercise keeps her energized.
The math exercise was challenging.
The army conducted a night exercise.
Crosswords are a great brain exercise.
Her exercise included jogging and yoga.
He was tired after a long day.
The runners were tired after the race.
She was tired of the same routine.
The kids were tired by bedtime.
He felt tired from the stress.
Democracy ensures fair elections.
She advocated for democracy in her speech.
The nation embraced democracy recently.
Democracy encourages open discussions.
They valued democracy above all.
She studied hard and ultimately passed.
Ultimately, family was her priority.
They disagreed but ultimately compromised.
Her choice was ultimately personal.
The deal was ultimately finalized.
